thread.section_title: One.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of One.com | www.one.com
thread.title: johan

author: johan
title: johan
text:
A crappy CalDav solution to integrate mail and agenda into outlook, results in jamming my outlook over and over again.
This besides the fact that the CalDav plugin has to be updated more than 1-times a week! It's really a horrible customer experience.
When asked to a planning they say they don't know when and if they will succeed in integrating with EAS syncing Outlook.
Goof luck with that :-(
